original_text: And he shall offer thereof his offering, even an offering made by fire unto the Lord; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
korean_text: 그는 그 중에서 예물을 가져다가 여호와께 화제를 드릴지니 곧 내장에 덮인 기름과 내장에 붙은 모든 기름과

sentences.original_text: And he shall offer thereof his offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것을 그의 제물로 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: even an offering made by fire unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 즉 불로 태워 주께 드리는 제물이라

sentences.original_text: the fat that covereth the inwards
and all the fat that is upon the inwards
